trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when attempting to apply an operator to incompatible operands when you evaluate a rule.
trans-unit.target: 尝试向不兼容的操作数应用运算符，计算规则时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref>与指定的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.ArgumentException.Message%2A> property of the new instance using the message parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.ArgumentException.Message%2A>属性使用消息参数的新实例。</xref:System.ArgumentException.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of Exception.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示异常的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that contains the error message to associate with this instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> ，其中包含要与此实例关联的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref>用序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during de-serialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>它保存关于所引发异常的序列化的对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>它包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: serializeInfo is a null reference (Visual Basic ).
trans-unit.target: serializeInfo为空引用 (Visual Basic )。

trans-unit.source: The class name is a null reference (Visual Basic <xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>) or the <xref:System.Exception.HResult*> is zero.
trans-unit.target: 类名称为空引用 (Visual Basic <xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>) 或<xref:System.Exception.HResult*>为零。</xref:System.Exception.HResult*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner <xref:System.Exception> that is the cause of this <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对内部<xref:System.Exception>这是此<xref:System.Exception>。</xref:System.Exception>根源</xref:System.Exception>的引用类

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that is thrown as a direct result of a previous <xref:System.Exception> should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>引发作为以前的直接结果<xref:System.Exception>应包含对前一个异常中的引用<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，则为空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述当前异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> instance that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>导致当前异常的实例。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> class with the details of the compatibility violation.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref>兼容性冲突的详细信息的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of Exception represented by this class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的此类表示的 Exception 实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The value of the argument `message`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A>|The value of the argument `left.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A>|The value of the argument `op.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A>|The value of the argument `right.`|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|自变量的值`message`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A>|自变量的值`left.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A>|自变量的值`op.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A>|自变量的值`right.` | </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the current <xref:System.Exception> .
trans-unit.target: 描述当前<xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception>的消息

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> appearing on the left side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>出现在运算符左边。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"></xref> representing the operator whose compatibility is violated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"> </xref>表示违反其兼容性的运算符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> appearing on the right side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>运算符右侧显示。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref> class with the details of the compatibility violation.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException"></xref>兼容性冲突的详细信息的类。

trans-unit.source: This includes the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>.
trans-unit.target: 这包括<xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of Exception represented by this class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的此类表示的 Exception 实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The value of the argument `ex.`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The value of the argument `message`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A>|The value of the argument `left.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A>|The value of the argument `op.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A>|The value of the argument `right.`|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|自变量的值`ex.`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|自变量的值`message`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A>|自变量的值`left.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A>|自变量的值`op.`| |<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A>|自变量的值`right.` | </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Right%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Operator%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.Left%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>使用有关异常的信息。

trans-unit.source: GetObjectData sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with all the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException> object data targeted for serialization.
trans-unit.target: GetObjectData 集<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>所有<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException>对象针对于序列化的数据。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: During de-serialization, this exception is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> transmitted over the stream.
trans-unit.target: 反序列化期间，此异常重建从<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>通过流传输。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>它保存关于所引发异常的序列化的对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>它包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Type> of the left argument of the expression causing the exception.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref:System.Type>引发异常的表达式左边自变量。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the left argument of the expression causing the exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>引发异常的表达式左边自变量。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"></xref> representing the operator which caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType"></xref>表示导致异常的运算符。
